name: Final Stand (hruhf)
description:
Unknown vessels were spotted approaching Earth. And they seem to be charging something... We estimate 120 seconds until the end of the world.

Sorry, I ran out of time for this so it's very unfinished and unbalanced. I'll try and update this page later if possible.

  • WASD -> Movement
  • Space/Ctrl -> Up/Down Movement
  • Mouse -> Look around
  • Left Shift -> Boost
  • Left Mouse -> Shoot
  • Upgrades:
  • Right Mouse -> Graviton Cannon
  • E -> Massacre

Audio was mixed from samples I already had lying around. Skybox is from some marketplace item I had.

Hints:

  • Your weapons reach around 1km.
  • Capital ships tend to be weaker from below or behind.
  • The power satellites are unstable, destroy their cores to cause huge damage.
  • Capital ships have some nice weaponry we can make use of.
  • Don't travel in a straight line.

Less cryptic hints:

  • Power satellites are immune to damage, but have 3 weak-points which when taken out will immediately destroy the satellite and heavily damage the nearby capital ship:
  • The carrier is probably the easiest ship to approach at the start
    • Followed by the battle cruiser
    • The missile cruiser isn't heavily armed, but the missiles are quite annoying to avoid.
  • Destroying a capital ship unlocks a weapon based on that ship.
    • Carrier gives you a ring of auto attacking drones, which attack nearby enemies.
    • The battlecruiser gives you a sniper, which is capable of damaging capital ships at a very long range, and one shots smaller targets.
      • It significantly out ranges every enemy in the game.
    • The missile cruiser gives you a missile barrage, which fires a missile at 10 nearby targets in quick succession, and recharges quickly.
      • Missile barrages will quickly neuter the super battleship's turrets, quickly rendering it undefended.
